channel.title: Buying a domain
channel.description: Hey, I've decided to partner up with someone and he's going to buy a domain but he cannot because his paypal is unverified. Anyone know of anywhere/anyone that he can buy the domain of with an unverified Paypal? Would appreciate it thankchya's.

item.title: Buying a domain
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:4, topic:436701”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=539418.msg3947876#msg3947876 date=1332032814]

He can’t buy anything with paypal until it’s verified. But I wouldn’t recommend trying to cheat the verification process. I did that and now my paypal is locked. (Only had 4 dollars when it got locked, but if he has alot of money in there he might be mad if he can’t do anything with it).

He can send money, I can send money on my unverified one. I meant to say no bank account is attached but your severely limited. i.e. you can’t pay monthly subscriptions spend limit and so forth.
[/quote]

Oh… well I couldn’t before I verified mine. And once I did, my paypal was locked.[/quote]
You can call them if they have a phone line and tell his parents or use his bank account to make a transfer via the interweb.

Read full topic

[/quote]
He can send money, I can send money on my unverified one. I meant to say no bank account is attached but your severely limited. i.e. you can’t pay monthly subscriptions spend limit and so forth.[/quote]

Oh… well I couldn’t before I verified mine. And once I did, my paypal was locked.

Read full topic
